reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown sexy and flattering, with one noting it accentuates the feminine figure perfectly. The garment fits well, is comfortable, and features a stretchy, soft material. While some customers describe the fabric as nice, others find it inferior in quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and comfy
items.body: Great quality material. Looks soft and feels even softer. I would get your recommended size. As a medium does fit me, the large would have been better for my breast size. Stretchy material so it fits well overall. Read more
items.author: Caitlynn Kelling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars üåôüíñ Soft, Cute & Comfy Sleep Dress!
items.body: Great quality for the price! The fabric is soft, stretchy, and super comfortable for sleeping. The lace trim and side slit make it cute and flattering without losing comfort. My husband loves how it looks on me, so win-win üòÖüíû Perfect for cozy nights! Read more
items.author: Leandra Gomez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft
items.body: Very comfortable,Very cute,definitely have some stretching to it so it‚Äôs perfect for thicker size woman as well.I love it.Definitely buying more colors Read more
items.author: Sakia Hill

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars BBW approved, and I love that the size was just right.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The fit was perfect and washing it is so easy. I love that it looks good on me the quality is great. Read more
items.author: Alura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: Love this! Although I thought I got the wrong size for me it ended up being a perfect fit. Very seductive in design with a slight tease with the slits on both sides. Fabric was soft and light. Great product will purchase more. Read more
items.author: April eick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
items.body: Just as pictured. Cute, comfy, and fit well. I was worried about not being able to get an extra small thinking it would be a bit loose in a small. It fits perfectly in all the right areas. Even has a material constructed under the boobs that hold them up a bit so your cleavage looks good. The material is soft like jersey or cotton and stretchy. I love them and my husband is always happy to see me wearing one of them. I ordered 4 and would reorder. Well made. I haven‚Äôt had them long so I am wondering how the straps will hold up. They do adjust but seem like they can get stretched out of shape if you know what i mean. Read more
items.author: Kae

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty, affordable and TINY
items.body: This is a child sized nightgown. The large was skin tight on top and flay on the bottom. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù 144 lbs and it looked ridiculous on me, if you‚Äôre super slim, buy this, bc the price is right and it‚Äôs pretty and soft! But the sizing is all wrong for an average person. Read more
items.author: Robin Jax

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy
items.body: Very nice & comfortable! Sexy little bedtime nightie! Read more
items.author: Jones

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Red, 2-pack Pink+black, Gray, 2-pack Red+black, Gray+black 2-pack, Heart Pattern-black, Z-butterfly Leopard, Y-blue, Black, Z-green, P-heart Pink, Star Dark Blue, 2-pack Blue+gray, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
